title: Seamus Murphy, PhD
text:
I currently work at Winrock International on the Ecosystem Services team with a focus on jurisdictional REDD+ development & verification.
 
  
   
  
    
     GitHub
  
  
    
     LinkedIn

title: Teaching
text:
I taught in the Statistics Department at Oregon State University from 2011-2022. I continue to host some past course materials:







Statistical Methods I


ST551


Graduate level methods class for statisticians.



Fall 2017










Time Series


ST565


Graduate level class covering exploratory analysis, ARIMA modelling, forecasting and time series regression.



Winter 2016










Statistical Methods II


ST552


Graduate level regression class for statisticians.



Winter 2016










Methods of Data Analysis I


ST511


Graduate level statistical methods class for non-statisticians with a focus on one and two sample problems, ANOVA and simple linear regression.



Fall 2015










Topics in Data Visualization


ST599


Perceptual principles, practice and critique with a focus on creation of graphics using the R package ggplot2.



Summer 2015










Methods of Data Analysis II


ST512


Graduate level statistical methods class with a focus on regression.



Winter 2015










Statistical Computing and Big Data


ST599


Practice based class exposing students to the challenges of working with big data with a focus on teamwork, data science workflow and presentation of results.



Spring 2014






No matching items

title: Workshops

Role

Intro to Positron for R/RStudio Users


Instructor


A half-day workshop at Cascadia R Conf on Positron particularly for R and RStudio users.


Jun 2025






Quarto Websites


Co-Instructor


A full-day workshop at posit::conf(2024) where learners walk away with a customized personal website.


Aug 2024






Reproducible publishing with Quarto


Co-Instructor


A full-day workshop at JSM 2024 for those coming to Quarto from R Markdown.


Aug 2024






Intro to Quarto


Instructor


A half-day workshop at Cascadia R Conf for those new to Quarto.


Jun 2024






Building Tidy Tools


Co-Instructor


A two-day workshop at rstudio::conf(2020) for those who have embraced the tidyverse and now want to expand it to meet their own needs.


Jan 2020






Welcome to the tidyverse


Co-Instructor


Two low cost, one-day workshops targeting underrepresented groups, Atlanta GA, providing a feel for the complete data analysis process in R - from importing and manipulating data, through to visualization.


Oct 2019






Happy R Users Purrr


Designer/Instructor


A tutorial on the R package purrr delivered at rstudio::conf 2017, Cascadia Conf 2017 and useR! 2017


Jul 2017
